text: Guacamole (called Guacamol in Central America and Cuba) is a Mexican dip made of avocados, salt and sometimes tomatoes. Various herbs may be added, such as chives. It is a green, creamy dip or garnish. It is often served as a dip or garnish with Mexican foods such as tacos and tortilla chips. == Related pages == * Wasakaka ==Other websites== *Guacamole recipes and avocado information Category:Condiments Category:Mexican sauces Category:Avocados
title: Guacamole
